DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to understand how diazoxide, a medication that has been shown to have effects on insulin and other hormone secretion, can regulate the production of sugar by the liver.
DOC.brief_title: Central Mechanisms That Regulate Glucose Metabolism in Humans
